title: Happy Birthday, Lace!
description:
The beaches of “Paradise” are finally open, and to celebrate, Becca and Michelle are talking with everyone’s favorite birthday girl, Lace! In her conversation with Becca and Michelle, Lace discusses her first impressions of all the guys, how grateful she was to Shanae for pulling her out of her funk, and how her time away from Bachelor Nation has set her up for her best summer yet.  

Plus, Becca and Michelle share their thoughts on our new Bachelor Zach and predict what his season will have in store! 

Don’t forget to rate and subscribe so you never miss an episode.

Thanks to our sponsors:

BetterHelp: BetterHelp.com/Bachelor
